issue.title: [CF 1578] bug buff "Coeur froid" 235599
issue.body:

i can't check it

> Posted by CurseForge user redstoff | Imported from CurseForge issue #1578 | Raw

comments.body:
The ID of the buff is 281209, not 235599. When in doubt, check it by name, not ID.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
